name: Crocodile Blood: The Final Moments of Kurumizawa Keiko
name_original: Crocodile Blood: The Final Moments of Kurumizawa Keiko
description:
Crocodile Blood: The Final Moments of Kurumizawa Keiko is a game developed by basementlevel. It was originally released in 2019.
You can play Crocodile Blood: The Final Moments of Kurumizawa Keiko on PC and macOS. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
